openness.neg: conventional, practical, prefers routine, resistant to change, narrow interests, skeptical of new ideas
openness.pos: loves art, aware of one's own feelings, unpredictable, unusual ideas, curiosity, imagination, lack of focus, risk taking

conscientiousness.neg: disorganized, careless, unreliable, impulsive, messy, procrastinates, lacks direction
conscientiousness.pos: self disciplined, dutiful, strong direction, neat, reliable, detail oriented, prepared

extraversion.neg: speak very little, stutters, reluctant to share facts about self, reserved, quiet, solitary, avoids social interaction, low energy
extraversion.pos: external world engagement, action oriented, likely to start conversation/be around people/be engaged, breadth > depth of activities

agreeableness.neg: will not compromise or adjust for others, competitive, critical, confrontational, distrustful, prioritizes self-interest, less empathetic
agreeableness.pos: helpful, compromise own interests for social harmony, leadership, soft heart, sympathize with others

neuroticism.neg: emotionally stable, calm, resilient, low anxiety, steady mood, not easily stressed
neuroticism.pos: will not cooperate, suddenly lashes out, anger, anxiety, depression, emotional instability, reactive, easily stressed out, mood swings
